file_content.text: You destroy my ship, but Gormak will still reach the stars! All Voss corruption will die!
It is curse! Corruption like Voss! It is a trap! Even if I destroy all Voss, all corruption, I am still corrupt.
Gormak do not use corrupt nightmares! Gormak kill corruption!
Why do you wait, outsider? Strike! Kill me! End curse! Free Gormak from corruption!
I'll kill you when I'm done with you. Until then, you'll do as I say.
I'm calling the shots here.
Nothing you do to me is worse than the curse, outsider.
You want to die?
I am corrupt, like Voss. This must not be. Gormak must not fall to Voss corruption.
What do outsiders have to do with the Dark Heart? Answer me!
You said this was our fault?
In the Dark Heart, I find... the thing that lives there. Powerful. More powerful than Gormak or Voss or outsiders.
I try to fight it, but I fail. It sends the nightmares to punish me.
You have power. Stop complaining and use it.
That's hardly a punishment.
Why would it give you the power of prophesy and just set you free?
It just let you go?
What did the visions show you?
They show outsiders come here, long ago. Before outsiders, no corruption. After outsiders, corruption is Voss.
Kill me, outsider! Corruption must die!
If death is what you want, you can have it.
Very well. [Kill him]
Finally....
We will report Kotal-De's death and your victory to Telsin-Fal.
I'll give you to the Voss. Your visions might be worth something to them.
No. You could be useful alive.
We will take him to Telsin-Fal and report Kotal-De's death.
You should report to your people in Voss-Ka as well. Go with our gratitude.
You will never reach the stars. The Mystics have seen your failure.
Did they see you crushed by rocks? You are already dead, Voss.
A Gormak dares to speak as if he has a Mystic's knowledge? This is sacrilege!
It's nothing, an idle threat.
He's just mouthing off.
Threat? Ha! I know what I know.
He says you're going to be crushed by rocks, and you're angry that he's predicting things?
Your priorities seem twisted.
What's wrong with that?
Visions are a sacred gift given only to Mystics! They are not given to beasts like him!
Nightmares are curse! You outsiders brought curse on me!
Death will end your curse.
I could just kill you.
Things from the Dark Heart never die.
You can't be serious.
Outsiders help Voss! I have no choice! Voss must die!
Where did you get this power? How do you use it?
How did you get "cursed"?
I enter the Dark Heart, search for weapon to stop outsiders from helping Voss. Instead, I find nightmares.
The Dark Heart is an evil place. All who go near it are driven mad. No one returns from there.
Outsiders made Dark Heart. Nightmares show me. Corruption comes from outsiders.
Your fault! Your fault I am corrupt, outsider! I will use the curse to destroy all Voss! Corruption will die with me!
